Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: Saad, I've fixed this for the server config file. I'm assigning to you to fix for the client file which you introduced for TLS configuration. See cop_client.json and cop_client2.json in testdata. We should only need a cop_client.json and can delete cop_client2.json once that is done. See http://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/3749 for how this is solved for the server. You can reuse the util.MakeFileAbs function for this.
